parameters.name: DtsJobIds
parameters.description:
The ID of the data migration or data synchronization task.

> 
*   For multiple tasks, separate them with commas (,).
*   You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the task ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the DTS instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: ZeroEtlJob
parameters.description:
Whether it is a seamless integration (Zero-ETL) task, the value can be:
- **false**: No. - **true**: Yes.
